text: Invasive may refer to: *Invasive (medical) procedure *Invasive species *Invasive observation, especially in reference to surveillance *Invasively progressive spread of disease from one organ in the body to another, especially in reference to cancer, see invasion (cancer) ==See also== *Intruder (disambiguation) *Invasion (disambiguation) *Intrusive (disambiguation) *Invasive procedure (disambiguation)
title: Invasive
